row.col: Judgment of the Court (Fifth Chamber) of 7 June 2018.#Scotch Whisky Association v Michael Klotz.#Reference for a preliminary ruling — Protection of geographical indications of spirit drinks — Regulation (EC) No 110/2008 — Article 16(a) to (c) — Annex III –– Registered geographical indication ‘Scotch Whisky’ — Whisky produced in Germany and marketed under the designation ‘Glen Buchenbach’.#Case C-44/17.
